nationalInsuranceNumber.title: What’s your National Insurance number?
nationalInsuranceNumber.heading: What’s your National Insurance number?
nationalInsuranceNumber.hint: You can find it on your National Insurance card, benefit letters, or official letters about tax. For example, QQ123456C.
nationalInsuranceNumber.explanation: We need this to check your eligibility.

name.title: What’s your name?
name.heading: What’s your name?
name.hint: Use the name that’s on your official documents, such as passport, driving licence, or any benefit claims.
name.explanation: We need this to confirm your identity and eligibility. Your name will also appear on your prepaid card.

dateOfBirth.title: What’s your date of birth?
dateOfBirth.heading: What’s your date of birth?
dateOfBirth.explanation: We need this to confirm your identity and eligibility.

doYouHaveChildren.title: Do you have any children under 4 years old?
doYouHaveChildren.heading: Do you have any children under 4 years old?
doYouHaveChildren.formDescription: Do not include children who are 4 years old or over.
doYouHaveChildren.explanation: We need this to work out how much money you should get.

childDateOfBirth.title: Enter your children’s dates of birth
childDateOfBirth.heading: Enter your children’s dates of birth
childDateOfBirth.explanation: Children’s names will not be stored or shared. We need their dates of birth to check eligibility, to confirm your identity and to prevent fraud.

areYouPregnant.title: Are you pregnant?
areYouPregnant.heading: Are you pregnant?
areYouPregnant.expectedDeliveryDateText: When is your baby due? You must be at least 10 weeks pregnant.
areYouPregnant.explanation: We need this to work out how much money you should get.
areYouPregnant.formDescription: If you’re pregnant you must tell the benefits agency when your baby is born.

address.title: What’s your address?
address.heading: What’s your address?
address.formDescription: If you claim any benefits you must use the same address registered with the benefits agency (DWP or HMRC).
address.explanation: We need this to confirm your identity and eligibility. We’ll send your prepaid card to this address.
address.hint: Enter the first line of your address
address.addressNotListed: I can’t find my address in the list
address.errorWithPostcodeLookup: There’s a problem with the postcode finder

postcode.title: What’s your address?
postcode.heading: What’s your address?
postcode.formDescription: If you claim any benefits you must use the same address registered with the benefits agency (DWP or HMRC).
postcode.explanation: We need this to confirm your identity and eligibility. We’ll send your prepaid card to this address.

phoneNumber.title: What’s your mobile telephone number?
phoneNumber.heading: What’s your mobile telephone number?
phoneNumber.formDescription: If you claim any benefits you must use the same mobile number registered with the benefits agency (DWP or HMRC).
phoneNumber.explanation: We need this to prevent fraud and to contact you about your application if necessary.

emailAddress.title: What’s your email address?
emailAddress.heading: What’s your email address?
emailAddress.formDescription: If you claim any benefits you must use the same email address registered with the benefits agency (DWP or HMRC).
emailAddress.explanation: We need this to send notifications about your application and your prepaid card.

sendCode.title: We’re sending you a code
sendCode.heading: We’re sending you a code
sendCode.hint: Select how you would like to receive it
sendCode.explanation: We need this to confirm your identity and to prevent fraud.

enterCode.title: Enter your code
enterCode.heading: Enter your code
enterCode.weJustSentASixDigitCodeTo: We just sent a 6 digit code to
enterCode.itMayTakeAFewMinutesToArrive: It may take a few minutes to arrive.
enterCode.requestNewCodeLink: Request a new code if it does not arrive

terms-and-conditions.title: Terms and conditions
terms-and-conditions.heading: Terms and conditions
terms-and-conditions.statement: I confirm that I’ve read and will comply with these terms and conditions.

decisionFallbackSuccessful.title: Application successful
decisionFallbackSuccessful.subTitle: You’re entitled to £{{totalVoucherValue}} a week. Your first payment will be £{{totalVoucherValueForFourWeeks}}.

decisionFallbackUnsuccessful.title: Application not successful
decisionFallbackUnsuccessful.subTitle: You will not be sent a prepaid money card
decisionFallbackUnsuccessful.heading: Application not successful

failure.title: Application not successful
failure.body: You will not be sent a prepaid money card

holding.title: Sorry, the service is unavailable
holding.heading: Sorry, the service is unavailable
holding.useServiceFrom: You will be able to use the service from

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.heading: Page not found
pageNotFound.checkTypedAddress: Check that you typed or pasted the correct web address.

inScotland.title: You cannot apply if you live in Scotland
inScotland.heading: You cannot apply if you live in Scotland

guidance.heading: Get money off milk, food and vitamins (Healthy Start)
